trans-unit.source: Represents a size measurement in a log store policy.
trans-unit.target: 로그 저장소 정책의 크기 측정을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> structure represents a size measurement in a log store policy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> 구조체는 로그 저장소 정책의 크기 측정을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType> enumeration lists the units of measurement that can be represented.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType> 열거형은 나타낼 수 있는 단위를 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Value%2A> property to determine the size of the measurement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Value%2A> 속성을 사용하여 측정 크기를 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To determine the unit of measurement, use the <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Type%2A> property.
You can convert other data types to a <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> by using the <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Percentage%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Extents%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> 및 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Percentage%2A> 메서드를 사용하여 다른 데이터 형식을 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Extents%2A>로 변환할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class and <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> structure to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 클래스와 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> 구조체를 사용하여 로그 레코드 시퀀스에 대한 정책을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType" /> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> structure with the specified value and type.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 값과 형식을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> 구조체의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class and <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> structure to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 클래스와 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> 구조체를 사용하여 로그 레코드 시퀀스에 대한 정책을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> or <paramref name="type" /> is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 또는 <paramref name="type" />이 유효한 값이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 시퀀스가 삭제된 후 메서드가 호출된 경우

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.
trans-unit.target: 메모리가 부족하여 프로그램을 계속 실행할 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: The specified object to be checked.
Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스와 지정된 개체가 같은지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance and a specified object are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스와 지정된 개체가 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A number that represents the number of containers.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> of type <see cref="F:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType.Extents" /> from the specified number.
A <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> of type <see cref="F:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType.Extents" /> from the specified number.
Provides a unique hash code for this object.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체에 대한 고유한 해시 코드를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: An integer with the hash code value.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> on the left side of the operator.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> on the right side of the operator.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> instances to determine whether they are equal.
<see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 두 <see langword="true" /> 인스턴스가 같으면 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this operator to compare two <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> instances for equality.
trans-unit.target: 두 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> 인스턴스가 같은지 비교하려면 이 연산자를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: For both objects to be equal, they must have the same values for both the <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Type%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 두 개체가 같으려면 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Type%2A> 및 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Value%2A> 속성의 값이 모두 같아야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> on the left side of the operator.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> on the right side of the operator.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> instances to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> 인스턴스가 동일하지 않은지 비교합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> instances are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 두 <see langword="true" /> 인스턴스가 같지 않으면 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this operator to compare two <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> instances for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 두 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit> 인스턴스가 같지 않은지 비교하려면 이 연산자를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: For both objects to not be equal, they must have different values for the <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Type%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 두 개체가 같지 않으려면 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Type%2A> 및 <xref:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit.Value%2A> 속성의 값이 서로 달라야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A number that represents the percentage.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> of type <see cref="F:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType.Percentage" /> from the specified number.
A <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" /> of type <see cref="F:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType.Percentage" /> from the specified number.
Returns a string representation of this object.
A string representing this object.
Gets the unit type of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType" /> values.
The default is <see cref="F:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnitType.Extents" />.
Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" />.
The value of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.PolicyUnit" />.
